Date is equal to or later than Order Date
Your doc total CN larger than doc total Invoice

STP.TXT: Do you want to save the data ?

Text.val: -- Set Base kosong jika DocTotal CN <> Outstanding Base Doc
-- Set BaseEntry kembali jika DocTotal CN <> Outstanding saat User Edit Data

STP.TXT: Do You want to close this windows ?

ExpSyntax.val: 'Exceed the maximum allowable due date, '&Str({0,336},'2')&' month and '&Str({0,331},'2')&' days from Doc Date'

MlsTrans('Date is equal to or later than Order Date')

MlsTrans('Do you want to save the data ?')
MlsTrans('Do You want to close this windows ?')

MlsTrans('Date do not lay between the current date')
MlsTrans('Credit note is larger than the invoice, the document will become an outstanding credit note')
MlsTrans('Date must not exceed today''s date')
MlsTrans('This customer has been blocked. Immediately complete the previous transaction')
StrBuild(MlsTrans('Rounding cannot be greater than limit. Current Limit: @1@'), Trim(Str({0,439}, 'N'&{32768,139})))
Trim({0,1})<>'' AND (Trim({0,39})='' OR ISNULL({0,39})) AND Stat(0,'CM'MODE)
IF({0,12} = 13 , MlsTrans('No. A/R Invoice'),MlsTrans('No. A/R DP'))
MlsTrans('Invalid AR Downpayment or Zero Outstanding')
Trim({0,158})<>'' AND (Trim({0,161})='' OR ISNULL({0,161})) AND LastClicked()<>'CloseWindow'

STP.TXT: Quantity cannot be more than invoice

ExpSyntax.val: NOT ISNULL({0,3}) AND Stat(0,'CM'MODE) AND (ISNULL({0,69}) OR Trim({0,69})='')
MlsTrans('Quantity cannot be more than invoice')

ItemsList.valUnicode: E, N, Q, T, V, W

DisplayList.valUnicode: Equally, None, Quantity, Row Total, Volume, Weight

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(0) from ORIN where NumAtCard = ':1' and DocDate between ':2' and ':3' and CANCELED = 'N'
